location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that Bruce offer protection to Meerza Mohamed Hossain [Muhammad Husain Khan], son of Meedhi Alle Khan [Mehdi Ali Khan] and includes a translation of a letter from Meerza Mohamed Hossain to Sir Evan Nepean, dated 29 June 1816, outlining his position since the death of his mother and his disagreement with the Governor of Bushire regarding the house in which the Governor resides but which belongs to the family of Meerza Mohamed Hossain.
